name: Sample-chart
title: Consumption of system I/O time
subtitle: Cumulative percentage of platform I/O time consumed by jobs.

yAxis.title: Percentage of Total System I/O Time

series.name: Mira
series.query: select @jobid:=@jobid+1 as jobid, @total_iotime:=@total_iotime + t1.iotime as total_iotime, system_iotime, @total_iotime/system_iotime as job_sys_io_percent from  (select iotime from jobs_info where iotime is not null order by iotime desc) t1,  (select sum(iotime) as system_iotime from jobs_info) t2,  (select @jobid:=0,@total_iotime:=0) t3
